ygData.subject: Duel Wield
ygData.msgSnippet: I sold my Mino axe and bought a FS 2H Sword (for practice).  Now I am using a Combine Longsword and a FS Longword at level 13 - a battle looks something like
ygData.messageBody:
I sold my Mino axe and bought a FS 2H Sword (for practice). Now I am using
a Combine Longsword and a FS Longword at level 13 - a battle looks something
like this;

you have hit for 12 points
you have hit for 12 points
you kicked for 8 points of damage
you have hit for 12 points
you have hit for 12 points
you have hit for 12 points
you have hit for 12 points
the monster tried to hit you but was parried
you have hit for 12 points
you have hit for 12 points
you bashed for 6 points
you have hit for 12 points
you have hit for 12 points
you have hit for 12 points
you have hit for 12 points
the monster hit for 22 points of damage
you have hit for 12 points
you have hit for 12 points
you kicked for 8 points of damage
you have hit for 12 points
you have hit for 12 points
you have hit for 12 points
you have hit for 12 points
the monster tries to hit you but you dodge
you have hit for 12 points
you gain experience!

Duel Wield Rocks!!!!

For the Honor and Glory of Rellos Zek;

Patty of Halas
username: Patricia
server: Bristlebane
